text:
Keberhasilan inovasi yang dilakukan oleh engineer Indonesia dari varian Landing Dock menjadi Kapal Rumah Sakit / Hospital Ship, dengan sederet keberhasilannya menjalankan misi operasi bersama TNI Angkatan Laut, hingga saat ini menjadi salah satu andalan di setiap momen pameran.
CEO PT PAL Indonesia, Kaharuddin Djenod, menegaskan komitmen dan dukungan PT PAL dalam memenuhi program modernisasi Alutsista Angkatan Laut Filipina dan memperkuat kerja sama pertahanan di kawasan ASEAN.
"Sudah hamper 1 dekade, PT PAL menjadi strategic partner khususnya bagi Angkatan Laut Filipina. Dan hanya produk dan layanan terbaik yang diberikan oleh PT PAL dalam mendukung peningkatan performa bagi Angkatan Laut Filipina,” tutur Djenod.
Pada pameran ini, PT PAL menampilkan dua produk unggulannya, yaitu Landing Dock yang merupakan pesanan angkatan laut Filipina dan Kapal Rumah Sakit / Hospital Ship.
trans:
The success of the innovation carried out by Indonesian engineers from the Landing Dock variant into a Hospital Ship has demonstrated a series of accomplishments in conducting joint operations missions with the Indonesian Navy. To date, it has become one of the highlights at every exhibition moment.
The CEO of PT PAL Indonesia, Kaharuddin Djenod, emphasized the commitment and support of PT PAL in fulfilling the modernization program of the Philippine Navy's defense equipment and strengthening defense cooperation in the ASEAN region.
“For nearly a decade, PT PAL has been a strategic partner, particularly for the Philippine Navy. Only the best products and services are provided by PT PAL to support the performance enhancement of the Philippine Navy,” said Djenod.
At this exhibition, PT PAL showcased two of its flagship products: the Landing Dock, which is an order from the Philippine Navy, and the Hospital Ship.
